mapper.update:
update PARA_NAMESPACE_ORG
IS_TBNAME = #{isTbname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSACTION_DESC = #{transactionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODULE_ID = #{moduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JSP_URL = #{jspUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BAND_ENTERINGCHECK = #{bandEnteringcheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_AUTH = #{deleteAuth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAMESPACE_NAME = #{namespaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAMESPACE_DESC = #{namespaceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JSP_VIEWURL = #{jspViewurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where TRANSACTION_ID = #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into PARA_NAMESPACE_ORG
TRANSACTION_ID,
IS_TBNAME,
TRANSACTION_DESC,
SYSTEM_ID,
MODULE_ID,
JSP_URL,
BAND_ENTERINGCHECK,
DELETE_AUTH,
NAMESPACE_NAME,
NAMESPACE_DESC,
JSP_VIEWURL,
#{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isTbname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{transactionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{systemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{moduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jspUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{deleteAuth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{namespaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{namespaceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jspViewurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
select
TRANSACTION_ID pk_value, TRANSACTION_ID || ' ' || TRANSACTION_DESC pk_desc
TRANSACTION_ID pk_value, concat(TRANSACTION_ID,' ', TRANSACTION_DESC) pk_desc
FROM PARA_NAMESPACE_ORG where IS_TBNAME = 'Y'

select
TRANSACTION_ID pk_value, TRANSACTION_ID || ' ' || TRANSACTION_DESC pk_desc
TRANSACTION_ID pk_value, concat(TRANSACTION_ID,' ', TRANSACTION_DESC) pk_desc
FROM PARA_NAMESPACE_ORG WHERE MODULE_ID = #{moduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
